snippet: Rob McCord, who resigned Friday as state treasurer after six years in office, plans to plead guilty to federal extortion charges.
abstract: Rob McCord, who resigned as Pennsylvania state treasurer after six years in office, plans to plead guilty to federal extortion charges.
lead_paragraph: Rob McCord, who resigned Friday as state treasurer after six years in office, plans to plead guilty to federal extortion charges.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Former State Treasurer Admits Guilt in Extortion Case
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Former State Treasurer Admits Guilt in Extortion Case
